hotels.name: Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh
hotels.description: Experience world-class service at Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Rediscover World-Class Luxury at Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt Located on a one-kilometre stretch of private beachfront, Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt is a luxurious oasis between the desert and the reef with year-round sunshine, sleek modern accommodations and panoramic Red Sea views. Boasting 5 outdoor pools, 10 al fresco dining experiences, a highly acclaimed spa, fun-filled Kids For All Seasons club and an expertly run PADI dive centre combined with one of the best house reefs in the region and a funicular that transports guests from peak to beach. The resort’s spacious guest rooms and oversized suites range from one to four bedrooms, with a choice of modern design or traditional Arabian décor. All featuring a private balcony or terrace, some with a private pool and kitchen or kitchenette – ideal for families, group travellers and couples. Each accommodation offers comfortable living areas with a flat-screen TV, the legendary Four Seasons bed and expansive spa-like marble bathrooms aglow with sunlight. Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh offers a stellar culinary experience ranging from Pan-Asian, Italian, Lebanese and Latin American cuisines as well as a bare-foot chic beach bar and authentic lounge with daily live entertainment. The resort offers a special program for younger guests with a daily schedule of games, arts and crafts, cultural immersion and active play including a space reserved just for teens as well as professional babysitting services in addition to 4 tennis courts. The Spa blends the latest wellness innovations with authentic Egyptian traditions. Offering 12 treatment rooms including a lavish couple’s suite and two outdoor cabanas facing the Red Sea, a lap pool, beauty salon and state-of-the-art fitness centre. Other facilities include meeting and wedding venues with dedicated staff as well as expert concierge services. Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh is a 10-minute drive from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, a 25-minute drive from Naama Bay. Old Sharm with its traditional markets is 40 minutes away by car. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.
